lore: Although they only live in villages and small towns, Pilwiz society is strongly linked to that of humans, so much that both species have become dependent on each other.\n\nThe Darkscythe Pilwiz is the guardian of the night. Many creatures wait under the cover of darkness to stalk their prey or commit illegal activities related to the theft of vegetables or cereals. This creature never warns and never asks questions. It stealthily approaches any intruders and appears behind them, ready to attack.
menagerieDialog: (No one works the land quite like the Pilwiz, but this one seems to prefer lazing around.)
(It's repeatedly slashing at the air with its scythes.)
(It's trimming some flowers, because what else is a creature with scythes for limbs supposed to do in their free time?)
(Its gaze is lost in the distance, as if yearning to be someplace else.)
(This creature's lifelong dream is to become a gardener. Unfortunately for it, you've decided to enlist it into a lifetime of warfare.)
name: Darkscythe Pilwiz
